programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: An epic fantasy adventure from director Chen Kaige (Farewell My Concubine). Nominated for a golden globe for best foreign language film.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Back in the Day
programme.desc: A young boxer is taken under the wing of a mob boss after his Mother dies and his Father is run out of town for being an abusive alcoholic.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Par manu tēvu
programme.desc: Kad Sebastjana tēvs Salvo, vecmodīgs itāļu imigrants, uzzina, ka dēls grasās bildināt savu no papēžiem līdz matu galiņiem amerikānisko draudzeni, Salvo uzstāj, ka vēlas pavadīt neaizmirstamu nedēļas nogali ar viņas smalkajiem un bagātajiem vecākiem.

programme.title: Hērakls
programme.desc: Izturējis savus leģendāros divpadsmit darbus, grieķu padieva Herkulesa dzīve kā zobens tiek pārbaudīta, kad Trāķijas karalis un viņa meita meklē viņa palīdzību, lai sakautu tirānisku karavadoni.

programme.desc: Litogrāfijas mākslas radīšana.

programme.title: Slevina laimīgais skaitlis
programme.desc: Miermīlīgo puisi Slevinu netīšām sajauc ar kādu citu. Pašam negribot, viņš iesaistās karā starp diviem bandītu grupējumiem, kurus vada visslavenākās kriminālas autoritātes pilsētā - Rabijs un Boss. Tagad Slevinam seko līdzi gan neatlaidīgais detektīvs Brikovskis, gan neģēlīgais slepkava Gudkets. Ka izķepuroties no šādas situācijas?

programme.title: Brīvības skaņa
programme.desc: Neticams, bet tomēr patiess stāsts par bijušo valdības aģentu, kurš kļuvis par modru modrības sargu. Viņš devies bīstamā misijā, lai glābtu simtiem bērnu no cilvēku tirgotājiem.

programme.title: Trauksmes signāls
programme.desc: Filmā vēstīts par korumpētu policistu grupu, kas nokļuvusi mafijas šantāžas tīklā. Iebiedējot un šantažējot reiz paklupušus policistus, ļaundari piespiež viņus pastrādāt noziegumu pēc nozieguma. Plānojot lielu aplaupīšanu, policisti izšķiras novākt vienu no saviem kolēģiem.

programme.title: Amerikāņu afēra
programme.desc: Filmas sižeta pamatā ir septiņdesmito gadu beigās reāli notikusi speciālā operācija "Abscam", kuras laikā, lai noķertu zagtu mantu tirgoņus, bija paredzēts viņu vidē iefiltrēt FIB aģentus. Operācija izvērtās par korupcijas perēkli visos līmeņos...

programme.title: Roķīgā mamma
programme.desc: Mūziķe, kas pameta visu, lai piepildītu sapni un kļūtu par rokzvaigzni, atgriežas mājās, cenšoties sakārtot attiecības ar savu ģimeni.

programme.title: Avota kods
programme.desc: ASV armijas pilots Kolters atmostas Čikāgas piepilsētas vilcienā. Kolters nezina, kas viņš ir, kā viņu sauc un kā ķermenī atrodas. Taču izskatās, ka visi pārējie pasažieri viņu pazīst. Pirms Kolters saprot, kur atrodas, jaudīgs sprādziens iznīcina gan vilcienu, gan visus pasažierus...

programme.title: Ultraamerikāņi
programme.desc: Maiks strādā benzīna uzpildes stacijā un samērā bezmērķīgi pavada savu dzīvi, veltīdams daudz laika zālītes pīpēšanai kopā ar savu draudzeni Fību. Taču negaidīti atklājas, ka Maiks ir īpaši trenēts un ļoti nāvējošs slepenais aģents. Līdz šim nemaz nenojautis par saviem neparastajiem talantiem, Maiks tiek ierauts bīstamā valdības specdienestu spēlē, kurā jaunizceptajam varonim ir jāpieliek visi pūliņi, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.desc: 1928. gadā horeogrāfe Ida Rubinšteina Parīzē pasūtīja Morisam Ravēlam mūziku savam nākamajam baletam. Esot iedvesmas krīzē, komponists izvērtē savu dzīvi un nolemj veltīties universāla šedevra - "Bolero" - radīšanai.

programme.title: Stokholma
programme.desc: Kriminālkomēdijā "Stokholma" atainota bēdīgi slavenā ķīlnieku krīze 1973. gadā, kad laupītāji vairākas dienas turēja gūstā Stokholmas centrālās bankas darbiniekus. Tieši pēc šī gadījuma arī radās termins "Stokholmas sindroms", kas apzīmē situāciju, kad ķīlnieks izjūt simpātijas pret sagūstītāju un sāk to aizstāvēt.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Working with chefs they just met, the competitors strategize, collaborate and execute under the critical eyes of Michael and Bryan Voltaggio.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Mango, Pineapple And Pork. Oh My!. Michael Symon heats up the grill for a savoury pork tenderloin marinated in brown sugar, a fruity mango slaw and a thirst-quenching cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Moms All-American Mac. Michael Symon recreates the Greek-American dishes of his childhood, including his mothers pasta, a crispy salad and a mashup of two desserts.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Strawberry Pie In The Sky. Strawberries steal the show when Michael Symon makes spatchcock chicken and strawberry salad. Plus, Liz puts together a fresh strawberry pie.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: NOLA Beignet Dream. Michael Symon answers The Big Easys call with some New Orleans-style gumbo and chocolatey beignets. Liz sweetens the deal with a Sazerac.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.desc: The finalists are on a mission to showcase their best flavours and range. The pressure mounts as precious time is at stake in the advantage challenge.

programme.title: Cake Masters
programme.desc: Americas most in demand cake designer, Duff Goldman, has a long list of A-list Hollywood stars all desperate for the cake of their dreams. This reality TV series follows Goldmans new Los Angeles bakery and the cakes that it creates for its rich and famous clientele. Whether he is making a cake with a panorama of Los Angeles for a million-dollar gala or making a playable guitar cake, Duff Goldman and his crew aim to make edible works of art unlike anything that has been seen before. The Hollywood elite love these cakes and their demands range from hilarious to scary but it does not scare the bakers, if anything it spurs them on.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Halloween Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 2. Show.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 6: Risk Taking. Cooking game.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped

At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Cooking show.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 7. Cooking show.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Lūsija
programme.desc: Seksapīlā blondīne Lūsija kļūst par bīstamāko un nāvējošāko sievieti uz pasaules, apveltītu ar nepārspējamu intelektu un pārcilvēciskām fiziskām spējām. No potenciāla upura viņa ir pārvērtusies par mednieci un dodas pa pēdām tiem, kuri viņu gribēja nogalināt.

programme.title: Robota bērns
programme.desc: Kādu pusaugu meiteni pazemes bunkurā gādīgi uzaudzina robots "Māte", kura uzdevums ir atjaunot cilvēku populāciju pēc cilvēces izmiršanas globālā katastrofā. Tomēr meitenes un robota īpašā saikne tiek apdraudēta, kad viņu patvērumā nez no kurienes ierodas svešiniece ar satraucošām ziņām.

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Kellijai un Mekam šķiet, ka viņi kopā ar jaundzimušo bērnu ir pārcēlušies uz klusu rajonu, taču tad kaimiņos ievācas studentu korporācijas puiši. Tedijs ir korporācijas prezidents, un Pīts ir viņa vietnieks. Puiši naski pieņem draudzības piedāvājumu, kad Kellija un Meks ierodas iepazīties. Tomēr drīz vien laulātajam pārim ir jāsauc talkā policija jauno kaimiņu savaldīšanai. Šī rīcība izraisa šausminošas sekas.

programme.title: Izbrauciens
programme.desc: Bens Bārbers (Kevins Hārts) gatavojas precēties ar saderināto Andželu (Tika Samptere), kura ir viņa policijas partnera Džeimsa (Aiss Kjūbs) māsa. Policistus nosūta uzdevumā uz Maiami, lai izmeklētu nežēlīgā narkotiku tirgoņa Antonio Poupa (Bendžamins Brats) nodarījumus, par kuru ir zināms, ka tas apgādā visu Maiami ar narkotikām. Viņi apvienojas ar bezkompromisu detektīvi Maju (Olīvija Manna) un dodas pārtraukt Poupa darbību. Spriedze palielinās, tuvojoties Bena un Andželas kāzām.

programme.title: Trusītis Pēterītis 2: Mazais bēglis
programme.desc: Bea, Tomass un trusīši beidzot ir atraduši kopīgu valodu un vada mierīgu dzīvi laukos. Tomēr Pēterītis nespēj nosēdēt uz vietas – viņa dvēsele alkst piedzīvojumu. Tāpēc, izmantojot pagadījušos izdevību, mazais dumpinieks dodas iespaidu meklējumos uz pilsētu. Pēterīša lielā ģimene, riskējot ar visu, dodas viņu meklēt, un nu mazajam bēglim jāizlemj, kas viņam ir vissvarīgākais.

programme.title: Viena dzīve
programme.desc: Stāsts par seru Nikolasu Nicky Vintonu, kurš, būdams jauns Londonas brokeris, pirms Otrā pasaules kara sākuma izglāba vairāk nekā 600 bērnus no nacistu okupētās Čehoslovākijas.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Transilvānija" 3: Mošķu brīvdienas
programme.desc: Monstru ģimene šoreiz dodas brīvdienās. Luksusa kruīza kuģis aizvedīs Drakulu prom no rūpēm par viesnīcas apmeklētāju labsajūtu. Un kas ir atpūta bez draugiem, kuri tāpat ar prieku metas baudīt kuģa sniegtās izklaides! Taču, kad Drakula iemīlas noslēpumainajā kapteinē Ērikā, viņš vēl nenojauš, ka Ērika ir monstru lielākā ienaidnieka Ābrahama van Helsinga pēctece un sākas mošķu cienīga drāma.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Viss ir patiess
programme.desc: Ir 1613. gads, un Šekspīrs jau novērtēts kā šī laikmeta lieliskākais rakstnieks. Tomēr notiek traģēdija, un viņa slavenais Globe teātris Londonā nodeg līdz pašiem pamatiem. Saguris Šekspīrs atgriežas Stretfordā, kur viņam jāsaskaras ar savu smago pagātni un nolaidīgo ģimeni. Sava vienīgā dēla Hamneta nāves vajāts, viņam ir grūtības salabot attiecības ar ģimeni. Tomēr, to cenšoties, viņš ir spiests atkal un atkal izvērtēt savas neveiksmes.

programme.title: Lils, Lils, Krokodils!
programme.desc: Pēc pārcelšanās uz Ņujorku Primmu ģimene atklāj, ka viņu jaunās mājas bēniņos dzīvo Lils, dziedošs sālsūdens krokodils, kuram garšo kaviārs, patīk iet vannā un klausīties mūziku. Ar Lilu ātri sadraudzējas Primmu dēlēns Džošs, bet, kad krokodila eksistenci apdraud ļaunais kaimiņš, Primmiem jāapvienojas ar Lila harismātisko īpašnieku Hektoru Valenti, lai parādītu pasaulei, ka tajā ir vieta arī lielam, dziedošam krokodilam ar vēl lielāku personību.

programme.title: Es gribu dejot. Vitnijas Hjūstones stāsts
programme.desc: Līksms, emocionāls un sirdi plosošs ieskats Vitnijas Hjūstones, visu laiku labākās RandB stila popa dziedātājas, dzīvē un mūzikā, sākot no paša sākuma līdz mūzikas jomas slavas zālei.

programme.title: 47 ronini
programme.desc: Kādu dienu medību laikā Ako valdnieks Asano un viņa samuraji mežā atrod kādu vīru un aizved viņu uz pili. Pēc vairākiem gadiem valdnieks Asano rīko turnīru, lai godinātu komandiera ierašanos Ako. Turnīra vakarā valdnieku Asano nobur, lai viņš savainotu Nagato valdnieku Kiru. Komandieris piespriež Asano sodu - pašnāvību. Sapratuši, ka tas bijis valdnieka Kiras ļaunais plāns, samuraji un atradenis, ignorējot komandiera pavēles, dodas atriebties.

programme.title: Viņi
programme.desc: Pusaudžu grupa LGBTQ+ konversijas terapijas nometnē piedzīvo satraucošas psiholoģiskās tehnikas, kamēr viņus vajā noslēpumains maskēts slepkava.

programme.title: Mans spiegs
programme.desc: Rūdītais CIP aģents Džeidžejs tiek pazemināts amatā un nosūtīts misijā novērot deviņgadīgās Sofijas ģimeni. Kad meitene atrod dzīvoklī slepenās kameras, viņa izseko to signālam un atklāj novērošanas operāciju pārraudzības vietu. Solot nenodot atklātībai Džeidžeja aizsegu, Sofija pierunā aģentu veltīt viņai laiku un apmācīt spiegošanas prasmēs. Lai gan sākotnēji piedāvājums viņā raisa skepsi, Džeidžejs aptver, ka gudrībā un atjautībā ar Sofiju viņš mēroties nevar.

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Maks (Sets Rogens) un Kellija (Roza Bairna) gaida otru bērnu un nolemj pārvākties uz citurieni. Viņu plānam traucē Šelbija (Hloja Greisa Moreca), kura mēģina nodibināt studenšu klubu, lai viņa ar draugiem varētu rīkot savas ballītes. Abas grupas drīzumā kļūst par zvērinātiem ienaidniekiem, jo atšķiras to uzskati par skaļu mūziku un nepārtrauktu dzerstiņu. Maks un Kellija drīz sauc palīgā bijušo ienaidnieku Tediju (Zaks Efrons), lai neļautu kubam "Kappa Nu" turpināt traucēt dzīvi apkārtnē.

programme.title: Meklēšana
programme.desc: Kad pazūd Deivida Kima 16 gadus vecā meita, viņš pirmoreiz dzīvē iedziļinās meitas sociālo tīklu pasaulē, kura atklāj daudz vairāk, nekā sākotnēji šķita... Filma uzdod tiešus un neērtus jautājums, kas attiecināmu uz ikvienu, – cik daudz no sevis mēs mūsdienās uzticam sociālajiem tīkliem? Ko tie par mums stāsta, un kā ar mums ir iespējams manipulēt?

programme.title: Zemesriekstu sviesta piekūns
programme.desc: Zaks sirgst ar Dauna sindromu, un viņš dzīvo kopā ar savu aprūpētāju Elinoru.

programme.title: Megamainds pret Iznīcības sindikātu
programme.desc: Megamainda kādreizējā ļaundaru komanda Iznīcības sindikāts ir atgriezusies. Nesen kronētajam varonim Megamaindam nu jāsaglabā ļaundara tēls, līdz viņš varēs apvienot savus draugus, lai apturētu sliktos, kuri vēlas nosūtīt Metropilsētu uz Mēnesi.

programme.title: Bez pēdām
programme.desc: Tēvs un viņa trīspadsmit gadus vecā meita Portlendā, Oregonā, izdzīvo ideālo dzīvi. Līdz brīdim, kad neliela kļūda abu dzīves noved no sliedēm uz mūžiem.

programme.title: Vasaras mīlestība
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete gandrīz noslīkst, bet pēc tam iemīlas mazpilsētas puisī, savā glābējā. Filma uzņemta pēc Keitas Mārčantas romāna motīviem.

programme.title: Suņa dzīves jēga
programme.desc: Sirsnīgs un pārsteidzošs stāsts par uzticīgu suni, kurš, būdams līdzās dažādiem saimniekiem dažādos laikos, mācot cilvēkiem priecāties un mīlēt, atrod pats savas dzīves jēgu. Ģimenes filmu, kas aizraujošā veidā parāda pasauli no suņa skatu punkta.

programme.title: Slepenā mītne
programme.desc: Raiens Reinoldss tēlo jaunu CIP aģentu Metu Vestonu, kurš strādā slepenā mītnē Keiptaunā, Dienvidāfrikā, kad tiek notverts vismeklētākais bijušais CIP aģents Tobins Frosts (Denzels Vašingtons) un nogādāts šajā mītnē. Frosta nopratināšanas laikā mītnē iebrūk algotņi, kuri vēlas notvert Frostu. Vestons un Frosts izglābjas, taču viņi būs drošībā tikai tad, kad atradīs citu drošu mītni.

programme.title: Pasaules ieņemšana. Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: Zemi pārsteidz nezināma ienaidnieka uzbrukums – krīt nepārtraukts milzīgu meteorītu lietus, savā ceļā izpostot visu. Ātri vien kļūst skaidrs, ka pasauli cenšas iekarot citplanētieši. Tiem pretī nekavējoties stājas armija, taču spēki nešķiet samērīgi. Jūras kājinieku seržants Nants jau gatavojās atvaļināties, taču nu tiek nozīmēts uz jaunzveidoto kaujas vienību. Šīs vienības uzdevums ir glābt civiliedzīvotājus, kas ieslodzīti policijas iecirknī citplanētiešu iekarotajā teritorijā. Ir tikai trīs stundas laika, lai paveiktu misiju, jo tad Gaisa spēkiem tiks dota komanda bombardēt šo teritoriju.

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: Zagļu medības 2: Pantera
programme.desc: Lielais Niks atkal ir medībās – šoreiz Eiropā, un viņš jau tuvojas Donijam, kurš ir iesaistījies bīstamajā dimantu zagļu pasaulē un bēdīgi slavenajā "Panteras" mafijā. Viņi plāno grandiozu laupīšanu pasaulē lielākajā dimantu biržā.

programme.title: Tikai drosmīgie
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīts stāsts par kādu ugunsdzēsēju vienību, kas ar savu varonību, apņēmību un spēju upurēties kļūst par vienu labākajām ugunsdzēsēju vienībām ASV. Kamēr vairums ļaužu izvairās no briesmām, viņi dodas tām pretī, sargājot citu cilvēku dzīvību, mājas un visu, kas tiem dārgs. Viņi kļūst kā brāļi, un tam ir īpaša nozīme, kad nākas stāties pretī kādam liktenīgam ugunsgrēkam. 2013. gada vasara. Arizonas štatā plosās postoši ugunsgrēki, un glābēju grupa dodas tos novērst. Aktieru vidū ir gan "Oskaram" nominētais Džošs Brolins, gan "Oskara" saņēmējs Džefs Bridžess.

programme.title: Spiegs, kurš mani pameta
programme.desc: Divas labākās draudzenes, trīsdesmitgadnieces Odrija un Morgana, pašas pret savu gribu tiek ierautas starptautiskā sazvērestībā, kad viņu dzīvoklī pēkšņi uzrodas Odrijas bijušais draugs, kurš, kā izrādās, ir spiegs. Viņam uz papēžiem min algoti slepkavas, no kuriem tagad ir jāglābjas arī abām draudzenēm. Bēgot cauri visai Eiropai, draudzenes neticamā kārtā sveikā izkļūst no visām briesmām, turklāt pa ceļam vēl izdomā plānu, kā izglābt pasauli.

programme.title: Svešinieki: 1. nodaļa
programme.desc: Kad dīvainā mazpilsētā salūst viņu auto, jauns pāris ir spiesta pavadīt nakti nomaļā būdā. Izceļas panika, jo abus sāk terorizēt trīs maskās tērpti svešinieki, kuri uzbrūk bez žēlastības un, šķiet, bez motīva. Šausmu filmas galvenajās lomās: Madelaina Petša (seriāls "Riverdale"), Gabriels Baso ("Vasaras karaļi", "Super 8") un Oskara balvas laureāte Reičela Šentone ("The Silent Child").

programme.title: LaLiga. Atletico Madrid - Rayo Vallecano
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Sevilla - Villarreal
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. FR Gotteron - ZSC Lions
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. programme.title: MOTO GP. Japānas GP 1. treniņbrauciens

programme.title: Bundesliga. Bayern - Werder
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Sociedad - Mallorca
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. Marseille - PSG
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina restore a 1952 post-war home in Covina, CA. The house has a rich, industrial history but problems lurk around every corner.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Two flippers took on a property in Santa Clarita, but they desperately need help with the funky layout and unusual backyard "bomb shelter".

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.desc: Home renovation expert Jennifer Todryk combines clever design and cost-saving ideas to create stunning home overhauls without any major demolition.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict Lake House Rescue
programme.desc: Nicoles final challenge for her tiny lake cottage is to fill the cabins new first floor and basement spaces with the historic details she loves.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a Cliff May home to fit a couples modern lifestyle, and the historic house presents plenty of budget challenges.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of... Molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Kevin Costners the West
programme.desc: The abduction of nine-year-old Cynthia Ann Parker kicks off a series of increasingly deadly confrontations between her Comanche captors and the newly independent Texas.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Are a silver orb in the sky, and alleged crash debris from a UFO? Are an infamous spy organizations footage of UFOs and aliens the real deal? And what is the bizarre creature that washed ashore on a beach in Russia?

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Human error and right circumstances can become the recipe for a disaster and cause tragedies and serious accidents. When engineering goes wrong, trains carrying hazardous materials derail, luxury cruise ships wreck on the rocks, bridges collapse, construction cranes fall from the sky, bringing destruction and death.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: When army manoeuvres shut down the teams journey to restore an ancient minaret, they take a treacherous journey through the White Desert to camp in an oasis. Zahi makes friends with the local Bedouins, who feed the starving group.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. programme.desc: This docu-series takes the viewer on a disturbing psychological journey into the dark and foreboding world of true crimes carried out in lonesome and desolate locations. programme.title: Serial Killer: The Devil Unchained
programme.desc: In November 2016, Kala Brown was found chained to a wall on Todd Kohlepps property. After she witnessed the murder of her boyfriend, Kohlhepp kept her as his prisoner for two months. Upon her liberation by police, Kala Brown tells investigators that Kohlepp has killed many more people. Eventually charged for the murder of seven individuals, Kojlepp was given a life sentence for each of his victims. Despite confessing to the seven murders he committed, Kohlepp calls investigative journalist, Maria Awes, and claims he killed even more innocent people. Alongside FBI investigator, John Douglas, Awes sets out to confirm if Kohlepp is telling the truth, uncovering the chilling extent of his brutal crimes in this three-part documentary series.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A true-life crime documentary series that blends dramatic re-enactments with interviews from family and friends of the crime victims along with commentary from law enforcment officers, legal professionals and criminal psychologists. Each 60 minute episode features a specific case where the darkest fears of victims become harrowing realities. Epsiodes include such tales as when Matthew Heikkila shoots his parents and then terrorizes his girlfriend; when a flight attendant breaks her own rule of traveling alone just once and pays the ultimate price; when 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen goes for a run in the Montana wilderness and is taken prisoner by two mountain men; and when recently divorced Tanya Petro goes missing after meeting a new man.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Золотое дно
programme.desc: После смерти Алексея Градова, владельца крупного строительного холдинга, его наследники вступают в борьбу за миллиардное состояние с бывшим чиновником и бизнес-партнером покойного. Со стороны семьи войну возглавляет Градов-старший — патриарх семьи, основавший фамильный бизнес в 90-е, но отошедший от дел. В союзники он берёт финансиста и стратега компании Надежду, которая была не только коллегой, но и любовницей его сына. Кроме передела активов Градовы — жёны, дети, внуки — заняты выявлением старых обид и накопившихся друг к другу претензий. У них есть всё — деньги, власть, связи, статус. Но этого им мало. В погоне за наследством они готовы разорвать не только врагов семьи, но и друг друга.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: В этом монастыре ещё недавно была тюрьма. А до тюрьмы был монастырь. Там, где на нарах в три ряда спали зэки, нынче обитают монахини. У Иоанно-Предтеченского монастыря в Пермском городе Кунгур удивительная судьба: за век с небольшим он несколько раз менял испостаси, но чудом выстоял.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Второй брак
programme.desc: Настя Окунева приезжает в Москву и получает работу в крупной строительной компании, которой руководит подруга её покойной матери, Кира Георгиевна. Когда Кира Георгиевна скоропостижно умирает, управление компанией переходит к её сыну Глебу - холостому и привлекательному молодому человеку. Неожиданно для Насти он начинает оказывать ей знаки внимания и даже делает предложение. Девушка без ума от счастья, но до конца боится поверить, что это происходит наяву. Если бы она только знала, что у Глеба давно есть невеста Марина, а руку и сердце он предлагает ей только затем, чтобы получить наследство...

programme.title: Второй брак

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Тульская область. Шахтёрский посёлок с говорящим названием Аварийный. В советские годы здесь был настоящий социалистический рай. Но сказка кончилась в 80-х. Кому-то повезло, их переселили. Но многие так и остались здесь, на обломках прежней жизни...

programme.title: Каменное сердце
programme.desc: Галина возглавляет редакцию крупной газеты. Пережив тяжелый развод, она перестает верить в существование любви, - в ее жизни остается только работа. Но когда ее издание публикует сенсационное расследование о махинациях бизнесмена Вячеслава Андреева, карьера тоже может вот-вот рухнуть: один из источников информации оказывается непроверенным, и Андреев подает иск о клевете. Чтобы избежать суда и спасти репутацию, Галина решает найти компромат на бизнесмена. Она отправляется в деревню, чтобы разыскать важного свидетеля - врача Михаила Леонтьева. По всей вероятности, именно по вине Андреева погибла жена доктора.
